```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
```

## Load Loinc Table

```{r}
loinc <- read_csv("scratch/Loinc.csv", guess_max = 100000)
```

```{r}
loinc %>%
    filter(STATUS == "ACTIVE") %>%
    select(LOINC_NUM, COMPONENT, SHORTNAME, LONG_COMMON_NAME, CLASS, DisplayName) %>%
    clean_names ->
    loinc_2
```

```{r}
loinc_2 %>%
    sample_n(100)
```
